TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted: but you nick yourself with it and receive the gift of tetanus

I wish for world peace.

Granted. The Space Nazis have come, and unify the world under their Supreme Reich. Mecha Hitler exists too now!

The world is at peace... .... peace. (After 10 years of unmentionably horrible events and war)

I wish for a wish-gun. With corruptions that would hit targets (not me!).

Granted. To demonstrate it, you fire it on yourself!

I wish the force of gravity was 1m/s less.

Granted, All mechanical objects are designed to work at full gravity and cease working

I wish for Unity 5 to be released.

Granted it's crap

i for more ram with golden horns

I wish for Unity 5 to be released.

It was released a couple of weeks ago now...

As for the Golden RAM:

Granted, but it crashes (into) your computer.

I wish for this, that, and the other.

Granted. All of those things are live grenades.

I wish for clay.

Granted you cut yourself on hardened clay

i wish for a pet squirrel

Granted. Battletoads.

I wish I had the time to speedrun Battletoads. I've wanted to for a while.

Granted. You have the time to do it, but you're just too lazy.

I wish I wasn't so lazy.

Granted you now work out 24 hours a day

i wish access to the darknet

You download Tor, with a virus...

i wish that downloads were faster...

Granted, they move so fast you can't actually click the "download" button.

I wish KSP version 1.0 to be everything it needs to be.

Granted. You get 1.0 everything it needs to be, but squad shuts down since they ran out of money to pay for all the staff. due to overtime.

I wish for a airplane that can go fast.

Edited March 18, 2015 by SlenderFan
Oops...

Granted. You have an airplane that can go fast. The problem is it goes so fast that it can fly into another dimention- one that has undead aliens which now proceed to take over the earth (Bukaroo banzai much?).

I could really go for a vacation right now. I wish for a vacation

Granted: you vacation in the jungle and contract a horrible disease and die.

I wish for a cool Mech suit for my kerbals.

Granted: life support is now stock and the mech doesn't have any built in.

I wish for Stock revamp stockified.

Granted, stock revamp becoming stock causes stock-ception, imploding all stock into a stock-singularity and permanently breaking the game.

I wish humans would become inter-planetary and NOT kill themselves in the process.

Granted. Jupiter.

I wish for a silver half dollar.

Granted, you get one half of a silver dollar. Since only whole coins are accepted, it is worthless.

I wish for a balloon.

Granted. It explodes. Hindenburg style.

I wish for pie.

Granted. The pie is actually C-4 coated with a layer of bread. As soon as you go to slice it, it detonates...

I wish for a B-25

Granted. Please enjoy your only-slightly-used B-25 CAT telephone.

...

That IS what you were referring to, right?

I wish for a powerful and functional top-of-the-line gaming PC to run all my favorite games on.

Granted. It can run your favorite games... only...

I wish I had a camera so I could make videos of me doing magic things.

Granted. You get the first ever portable camera, and you can't sell it.

I wish I was nocturnal.
